page.title: 06Social Welfare in W. Ho!
page.content: No doctors in village. A team of doctors centred at Northam. District Hospital at Barnstaple. 3 Hospitals for the elderly and physically handi- capped in Bideford. 1 dispensing chemist. 2 Rest homes for the elderly.Arthritis very prevalent. No local authority housing. 78% houses privately owned,21% rented properties many of which are summer lets to holiday makers.Many large Victorian and Edwardian houses have been converted to flats. Unemployment is a considerable problem especially so in winter months. Minority groups who are temporarily housed in Winter month lets . When they have to move to make room for Summer holiday lettings these homeless folk have to be housed by the Torridge District Council to other areas.
